== The UbuCon Installfest ==

TheUbucon is a series of Ubuntu community events, that appear to be <nowiki>[[UbuconSevilla|spreading around the world]]</nowiki>.

If you've never been to an installfest before, <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Installfest|read this]]</nowiki>.

The following is about the UbuCon to be held in New York on February 16 at Google. If you intend to volunteer for this, please edit the page and add your name below. We could use about 10 of you:
